All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Draw
"Draw" shows the background image on the "Gewinner" screen.
GameLogic
class GameLogic contains all logic related components of the game. 1. the integer array "positions" with 24 entries which represents all possible positions where you can place a gaming piece. 2. the boolean variable "spieler1zug" which states whether it is player one's turn or not.
GameScreen
The Game Screen is the Screen the actual game is played on.
Gewinner
Gewinner is the screen being displayed after the game has been finished and a winner has been established.
Holz
"Holz" shows the background image on the "WelcomeScreen".
ImageLoader
Reads images from stored data and makes them accessible for further usage.
Runner
 
Spielbrett
Class to draw the game board and all pieces in play.
Spieler
Class Spieler represents each of the two playing parties with respective properties like name and remaining pieces.
WelcomeScreen
WelcomeScreen is the first screen the user gets to see when opening the program.
